page.title: 16Trade Felinfoel Brewery.
page.content: The Brewery started production in 1878.The man responsible was the first manager, Mr.David John.{ Felinfoel {Brewery was the first company in {Europe to can beer.}In 1935 a representative from the Metal Box Company arrived at the brewery with this idea. Llanelli,in those days was very much the centre of the tin plate industry. The Brewery chairman was a shareholder and director in one of the tin plate mills.He thought the canning of beer was a good idea as it would help to stimulate the industry because they were in a period of depression in the mid-thirties. Thousands of dozens of cans were sent during wartime to the forces. After the war sales decreased. But in the last ten years, cans,in what's known as the " take home trade" have grown and grown.
